description: Master Avery's favorite day of the year is Halloween. The day he performs a ritual in which he ties up his victim on the satanic pentagram. Hoping to wake up his master, the infamous Baphomet, Master Avery sacrifices Alessio Romero's body with hot wax, a double flogging, and the single tail. As the final offering to the master's master, Alessio is fucked hard in tight bondage and made to cum on the satanic symbol.
title: My Master's Master - Halloween Update
